get.summary: Get Calendar for an IFI and Code

post.description:
The endpoint supports the following views -

BASIC
EXPANDED
EXPANDED_SENSITIVE
One or multiple filters can be passed to get the results. EXPANDED_SENSITIVE view is supported only if you are PCI DSS compliant.
